body:
@apaszke Thanks for your reply!

Unfortunately, when I enable the cuDNN, the memory keeps increasing even after 200 epochs. 
While cuDNN is disabled, the memory keeps constant after several epochs. 

When enables cuDNN: (epoch > 240)
![enable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9111828/32726630-8ffcdb4a-c8b4-11e7-8096-82bfbfd2d45b.png)

When disable cuDNN: (epoch > 28)
![disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9111828/32726638-9a161718-c8b4-11e7-9a51-5a1a6bba7da3.png)
